description: TRIDENT attack/weakness/control graph data for Open Security Architecture

technique_control_mappings.notes: CTID maps 11 NIST families. Controls in other families (AT, AU, IR, MA, PE, PL, PM, PS, PT) have no ATT&CK mappings in this dataset.

mitigations.notes: 44 ATT&CK mitigations (M-series) with technique COUNTERS relationships. Cross-referenced to SP800-53 controls via shared technique coverage (PRESCRIBES edges). M1055 'Do Not Mitigate' correctly has no control links.

detection_strategies.source: MITRE ATT&CK STIX Data (v18 detection overhaul)
detection_strategies.notes: ATT&CK v18 replaced Data Sources with Detection Strategies (DET-series). Each strategy maps to one technique via DETECTS relationship.

cis_safeguard_index.notes: Reverse index of CIS v8 safeguard -> SP800-53 controls from existing OSA compliance mappings. Provides the IMPLEMENTED_BY edges in the TRIDENT model.

weakness_catalog.notes: CWE weakness classes mapped to ATT&CK techniques via CAPEC attack patterns. 135 CWEs map to 132 techniques in our catalog through 485 EXPLOITS edges. CAPEC IDs normalized from bare numbers to T-prefixed ATT&CK format.

threat_actors.notes: 163 active ATT&CK threat groups (G-series intrusion-sets) with USES relationships to techniques. 9 actors excluded (revoked/deprecated or no technique overlap with our 469-technique catalog). Actors carry aliases but not country attribution (deferred).

files.technique-catalog.json: 469 ATT&CK techniques with mitigations[], detection_strategies[], weaknesses[], actors[] back-references
files.mitigation-catalog.json: 44 ATT&CK mitigations with techniques[], controls[], cis_safeguards[]
files.detection-catalog.json: 691 ATT&CK v18 detection strategies with techniques[]
files.cis-safeguard-index.json: 171 CIS v8 safeguards with controls[] reverse index
files.weakness-catalog.json: 135 CWE weakness classes with techniques[] via CAPEC bridge
files.actor-catalog.json: 163 ATT&CK threat groups with techniques[], aliases
files.graph-edges.json: 18,111 explicit TRIDENT graph edges across 8 relationship types
